martial_artist_mobility.name: Martial Artist Kit: Mobility
martial_artist_mobility.trigger: Enemy ends their turn adjacent to you.
martial_artist_mobility.effect: Shift up to 2 squares as free triggered action.

battle_grace.name: Battle Grace
battle_grace.flavor: You feint to move your enemies into perfect position.
battle_grace.effect: If you roll a 12 or better and canâ€™t swap places with the target because one or both of you is too big to fit into the swapped space, you both remain in your original spaces and the target takes 2 extra damage.
battle_grace.powerroll_tier2: damage:9|effect:you swap places with the target
battle_grace.powerroll_tier3: damage:12|effect:you swap places with the target, then slide the target 2 squares
